Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Eliminate the ksharans in the Necromancer Tomb.

Kill all {@LinkCreature:471#105#ksharan battleragers}, {@LinkCreature:471#54#ksharan magisters}, {@LinkCreature:471#55#ksharan berserkers}, {@LinkCreature:471#56#ksharan myrmidons}, {@LinkCreature:471#5#ksharan destroyers}, and {@LinkCreature:471#6#ksharan defenders}.

Report to Valona when mission is complete.
Great job. Keep eradicating the foul ksharans.
Soon, we'll have control. If you get to work.
